name: Remember (JoshyOshKenoshi)
description:
Remember is a simple text-based adventure game where you play as an amnesiac, forced to trade your few remaining memories with other characters in the hope of remembering who you are. Any any stage, simply type in the number of an action to perform it.

Each character has a story to tell, and a memory that will benefit them; when you share it with them, you will gain access to one of their memories in return. Pay careful attention to each character - both to their story and to any descriptive clues - as your overall score will depend on how efficiently you share your memories.
